about_the_game:
Welcome aboard our family-crafted indie simulation game!

Take control of a majestic cruise ship, navigate scenic routes, and create unforgettable experiences for your virtual passengers. Sail through the challenges of running a cruise empire, from managing crew dynamics to organizing dreamy excursions. Immerse yourself in a heartwarming, high-seas adventure, crafted with love and passion by our family team. Get ready to embark on a shared journey, where dreams of captaining a cruise ship come alive in a delightful and unique gaming experience!


Anchors Away in Top-Down Mode or Play First-Person
Embark on a revolutionary cruise gaming experience! CruzeCraze offers an exciting camera perspective switching feature, allowing you to sail in top-down mode for a more strategic perspective or immerse yourself in first-person mode. Experience the thrills of being the best bartender on board or managing the entire ship from bow to stern. Get ready to switch perspectives and set sail for unforgettable gaming moments!

High-Seas Entrepreneurship
Conquer the challenges of a thriving cruise empire! In CruzeCraze you will test your strategic skills and business acumen. From logistics to financial management, experience the realities of operating a successful cruise enterprise. Face unexpected events and make critical decisions to ensure smooth operations. Dive into the world of high-seas entrepreneurship and prove your mettle as the ultimate cruise empire tycoon!

Explore Scenic Routes
Prepare to navigate spectacular waterscapes and stunning landscapes. Explore pristine tropical paradises, from majestic sunsets to lush coastal horizons, experience the beauty of nature along your virtual voyage. Get ready to chart your course through unforgettable scenic routes and revel in the art of exploration! Navigate stunning waters and create unforgettable experiences.

Captain Your Crew to Success
Manage crew dynamics, hire and train a colorful cast of characters, from seasoned crew to quirky entertainers. Foster teamwork, boost morale, and discover the power of effective leadership. Watch as crew relationships evolve and impact the cruise experience. Ready to captain your crew to triumph? Embark on the journey of a lifetime and unleash the power of crew dynamics!

Set Sail for Unparalleled Passenger Satisfaction
In CruzeCraze, ensuring passenger satisfaction is your ultimate mission. Create unforgettable sunset dinners to entertaining nightlife. From sparkling clean interiors to impeccable facilities, attention to detail is key. Oversee repairs and keep the vessel in shipshape condition. Set sail for unparalleled passenger satisfaction and make every journey extraordinary! Get 5-star reviews from your guests and unlock all the possibilities of building a cruise empire.

content_descriptors.notes: On a cruise ship parties occur and guest can sometimes be a bit crazy including language or behavior (consumption of alcohol and party like antics) that may not be appropriate for all audiences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650/GTX 1050-ti, or AMD RX 470/RX 570, or equivalent performance & VRAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is in development and minimum requirements may change.

short_description: Embark on a captivating cruise ship simulation game. Sail through the challenges of running a cruise empire. Navigate stunning waters and create unforgettable experiences. Managing crew dynamics, inventory logistics, and passenger satisfaction. Become the ultimate captain of the seas!
